about_the_game:
I think there's something wrong inside my head.
Follow Joe, an absolute mess of a person, as he wanders blindly from place to place in hopes of finding something that can distract him from his sickness.
His shattered mind is beyond repair. So let's just ignore it, okay?
Ignore it. Leave it to rot.

Let the whims of the world guide your hand, so that you may lose yourself in carnal pleasure.
There is beauty in patience. There is beauty in silence.
There is beauty in being the cause of another's madness.
Even in death, this is all I could've asked for.

Often compared to titles like Doki Doki Literature Club and Needy Streamer Overload, Unraveling Angel is a psychological horror visual novel with dating sim elements. Your choices determine the route you end up on and the ending you get.

Features:
  • 3 love interests, each with their own route (2 M / 1 F)
  • Beautiful hand drawn art
  • Multiple perspectives
  • Unique GUI that mimics an operating system
  • 1 redhead boyfriend who hates you

content_descriptors.notes: This game features sexual, violent, and psychological themes that might make viewers uncomfortable. Please do not play this game if you are sensitive to body horror, questionable consent, self harm, depersonalization, or infidelity.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Unraveling Angel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Drastische Gewalt
Alkohol / Tabak

short_description: Unraveling Angel is an adult horror visual novel about a man losing himself in a world that's rotting before his eyes. Bury yourself in the warmth of others and remember to forget how much they've always loved you.
